channel.title: Player Login, Help would be great!
channel.description: I want to make it that when a player logs in i want him to saw "Wazzap People? I'm Back!" And for new Players I want it to say "Wazzap People? I'm New!" on 562 please help me out on this

item.title: Player Login, Help would be great!
item.dc:creator: @Usagi Usagi
item.description:
@Usagi wrote:

In client.java look for the welcome message, you should be able to figure it out from there. There is also a method that handles the first time a player logs on (new user) which you could edit in the same manner as the first thing I suggested.

Read full topic
item.source: Player Login, Help would be great!
